# Getting the data

```{r}
load("~/Downloads/386248.RData")
library(protViz)

S <- as.psmSet(F225712)
```


```{r fig.retina=3}

plot.psm(S[[1]])
idx <- 1
S[[idx]]$mZ
S[[idx]]$intensity
```


```{r}
my <- function(mZ, intensity){
  sum(intensity)
}

myPlot <- function(mZ, intensity){
  plot(mZ, intensity, type = 'h')
}

myPlot(mZ = S[[idx]]$mZ, intensity = S[[idx]]$intensity)
```
